title: Server Issues
body: In my most recent game  4 of my team members all disconnected at the exact same time due to riot servers, none of the enemies did. we lost LP and got put in lower priority queue, this shouldn't be happening as that isn't very fair and it's not our fault.

replies.body:
Idk if this will do much - I've had similar issues before and then they've been like "deal with it" even though it's Riot's issue? 

Idk man
